summary:
• The IMF predicts that Argentina's economy will grow by 4% in 2021 due to improved policies.
• The peso has appreciated against the US dollar since October 2019.
• Inflation remains high at around 45%.

• A YouTuber who gained fame through his prank videos has been elected as a Member of European Parliament (MEP) from Cyprus.
• This unexpected election win highlights the power of social media influence on politics.
• As an MEP, he will represent the people of Cyprus in the European Parliament.

• French President Emmanuel Macron calls a snap election after the EU vote.
• A French police officer is detained over the alleged murder of a 19-year-old woman.
• The far-right party has made significant gains in the European Parliament elections.

• A massive lava flow has engulfed a major road in Iceland
• The eruption occurred at the Fagradalsfjall volcano near Krysuvik, a popular tourist destination
• Emergency responders and scientists have been deployed to monitor the situation and ensure public safety

• Benny Gantz, former Israeli Defense Minister, has resigned from his position in the war cabinet.
• His resignation comes amid controversies surrounding Israel's handling of COVID-19 pandemic and national security issues.
• The move may impact Israel's military strategy and regional alliances, potentially leading to changes in government policies.

• The European Parliament is shifting towards the right.
• Fine Gael and Fianna Fáil are leading in the Irish elections.
• These developments occurred on a dramatic night in Europe.

• Four Israeli hostages were rescued alive.
• The death toll in the conflict has risen to over 200.
• Gantz is leaving the emergency government in response to Netanyahu's leadership.

• An aircraft carrying Malawi's Vice President has gone missing.
• The plane was reportedly en route to Lilongwe from Mzuzu when it vanished.
• Authorities are working to locate the missing aircraft and its passengers.

• Three people were found guilty and sentenced for racially abusing a Real Madrid player.
• The incident occurred during a football match in Spain.
• The trio received punishment for their actions.

• The US has lifted its ban on providing weapons to certain Ukrainian military units.
• This decision allows these units to receive essential military aid.
• The move aims to support Ukraine in its ongoing conflict against Russia.

• The UN Security Council backs a US Israel-Gaza ceasefire plan.
• US civil rights hero James Lawson dies at 95.
• A jury begins deliberating in the historic Hunter Biden case.
